nodes.text: The Heavy blaster actuator was a model of blaster actuating module available in the period after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. The module was produced by the company Dolmax and cost 500, increasing the power and penetration of shots from the blaster pistol it was used in.
The Heavy blaster actuator was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013.
